page.title: 18The landscape of Greenwich
page.content: he one kilometre square that we are looking at doesn,t have much grass in it apart from the obvieus people,s back gardens, that is if they have any.The landscape of our square is mainly full of houses shop and a couple of in dustinal places. In my view the main part of our square is probably the hospital The main part of the area is on the side of a hill. The roads where all the shops are trafalgar road and woolwich road,are fairly grotty and grimy with the fumes from the power station and other near by places with chimneys i think this area could be improved as it is not the nicest place in the world to go shoping. the area on the whole through is a fairly pleasant area live in. by Clair Barwash.
